nf_ingredient_statement: Whole Grain Wheat, Corn Meal, Sugar, Brown Sugar, Raisins, Rice Flour, Almond Pieces, Corn Syrup, Salt, Whole Grain Oats, Glycerin, Dried Cranberries, Brown Sugar Syrup, Fractionated Palm Kernel Oil, Dextrose, Honey, Color Added, Trisodium Phosphate, Barley Malt Extract, Natural and Artificial | Flavor, Cinnamon, Baking Soda, Vitamin E (Mixed Tocopherols) and BHT Added to Preserve Freshness, Vitamins and Minerals: Calcium Carbonate, Zinc and Iron (Mineral Nutrients), Vitamin C (Sodium Ascorbate), a B Vitamin (Niacinamide), Vitamin Bs (Pyridoxine, Hydrochloride), Vitamin Ba (Riboflavin), Vitamin B (Thiamin Mononitrate), Vitamin A (Palmitate), B Vitamin (Folic Add), Vitamin Bi2, Vitamin D3.
